Updated November     pm







Carmin Chambers and Jade Jones help run the homecoming table in front of the UC PERIOD Monday October   PERIOD

On Monday Oct PERIOD  UTC continued its homecoming week celebrations with their Homecoming Launch Day Tables PERIOD

Thirdyear student Krish Vyas checks out the launch table in front of the UC PERIOD Monday October   PERIOD

From  a.m PERIOD to  p.m. students walking to class stopped at one of the two tables outside the University Center and at the top of Cardiac Hill PERIOD There they chose from free space themed truffle balls from Cupcake Kitchen keychains and other homecoming themed goodies PERIOD

For UTC tabling is a tradition during homecoming week but each year the freebies are geared towards the homecoming theme PERIOD This year the UTC and Beyond theme will feature everything to do with space PERIOD

Senior Carmin Chambers one of the student directors of the homecoming committeegreeted students with other committee members at the tables PERIOD

The tabling is something we do just about every year PERIOD Thats when we first start off by introducing the week we give out promo itemsIts kind of different every year because we have different promo items PERIOD Were giving out truffle balls we have key chains fanny packs just a couple items to get the students ready for the week and fill the space themes that were given PERIOD Chambers said PERIOD 

While the long planning period might seem surprising to some Chambers outlined the meticulous details that go into working with vendors PERIOD

As the months go by we have our meetings we keep implementing thingsThe tables and events you have to have vendors you have to have budgets PERIOD The key chains are custom made the truffle balls we ordered from a vendor so we have to take the time to connect with these vendors build relationships with these vendors PERIOD Chambers said PERIOD 

For more information about the rest of this weeks Homecoming events students can visit MocSync or follow utchomecoming on Instagram PERIOD
